I originally asked this question regarding 2.0RC1, but I didn't get any res=
ponse.  Given the sparse docs for 2.0, I'm backing up to 1.4.1 and asking t=
he same question:

I've got a set of seed URLs.  Each of the URL has some o=
ther meta-data (categorical) associated with it.  What I want to do is stor=
e each of the crawled URLs along with the meta-data associated with the see=
d URL.

Is it possible to keep that meta-data with the seed URL as the craw=
ling progresses?  Can I do it as a single job with many seeds or do I have =
to plan on creating a single job per "meta-data"?  Where do I plug in to re=
ceive the content of the crawled page?

Any pointers are greatly appreciate=
d.

tj
